products.title: Lana Mineral 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their beautiful lana range really creates that wow factor for an affordable price and is available in a range of on-trend colours with an attractive pattern. This blue vertical blind is perfect to add a stylish splash of colour to your room whilst also creating a cool hue.
